tool.name: aragorn

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Search for tRNA genes only. By default, both are detected.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be joined together with no space between them.
parameter_list.helptext: Search for tRNA genes with introns in anticodon loop with maximum length <max> bases, and minimum length <min> bases. Ignored if -m is specified. Value should be <min>,<max>. Values of 0,3000 are sensible defaults.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Assume that each sequence has a circular topology. Search wraps around each end. Default setting.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Assume that each sequence has a linear topology. Search does not wrap.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Double. Search both strands of each sequence. Default setting.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Single. Do not search the complementary strand of each sequence.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Verbose. Prints out search progress to STDERR.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Print out tRNA domain for tmRNA genes.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Print out genes in batch mode.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the value will be passed in the argument list (ie. the switch won't be used)

tool.description: ARAGORN detects tRNA and tmRNA genes.
